quotes.quote: The very ink with which history is written is merely fluid prejudice.
A drop of ink may make a million think.
To say a poem is absolute is saying nothing, because an ink blot can be absolute. Yet you put into it what you like. So it becomes totally relative.
Our live experiences, fixed in aphorisms, stiffen into cold epigrams. Our heart's blood, as we write it, turns to mere dull ink.
Ink, dark as night, creates words, and as they are read, they become the little beads and baubles of the mind.
The pages are still blank, but there is a miraculous feeling of the words being there, written in invisible ink and clamoring to become visible.
When the ink runs dry, you're most likely writing at the wrong angle.
We are the ink in which are written other messages that we cannot even understand.
It's not always the easiest thing to be the center of so much spilled ink.
Pale ink is better than the most retentive memory.
Ink is the transcript of thought.
The palest ink will endure beyond the memories of man
The blackest of fluid is used as an agent to enlighten the world.
Words running in my veins sprout out as ink of my pens
You bought me a pen, when you came. You became the ink, when you left
What happens in a certain place can stain your feelings for that location, just as ink can stain a white sheet.
An ocean of ink real and virtual has been spilled critiquing the appearance of female politicians.
How hard it is to make your thoughts look anything but imbecile fools when you paint them with ink on paper.
A recluse without books and ink is already in life a dead man.
The silence of the pen is only made louder by the sound of the ink running dry.
The ink of the scholar is more holy than the blood of the martyr.
What joy there is in hearing yourself think, and to make that thinking into ink.
Write down, before the ink gets dry. Speak up, before the tears get dry.
His diary; her handwriting. the marriage chapter is always an interesting ink.
The purpose of literature is to turn blood into ink.
Every guy should be the owner of a really nice pen. When you put your thoughts down, or whenever you're going to share something with someone, it means something if it bleeds out in a nice ink.
Inking is meditation in liquid form
Never pick a fight with people who buy ink by the barrel.
Memory is more indelible than ink.
